H0.text: Sublimation is the conversion of a solid to a gas.

H1.text: Speciation is the conversion of a solid to a gas.

H2.text: Amplification is the conversion of a solid to a gas.

H3.text: Education is the conversion of a solid to a gas.

A4.text: Sublimation is the transition of a substance directly from the solid to the gas state, without passing through the liquid state.

A5.text: Sublimation is caused by the absorption of heat which provides enough energy for some molecules to overcome the attractive forces of their neighbors and escape into the vapor phase.
